data.title: PAUL N T NGUYEN DDS INC in Irvine, CA
data.meta_description: PAUL N T NGUYEN DDS INC, a Medical Group Practice located in Irvine, CA
data.text:
"This guy is the greatest. I am in my 30's and one of those people who are extremely difficult to numb (I'm taking top 5% and that's quite conservative). My dentist made sure to refer me to someone who can handle my resistance to novacain when I needed a root canal. Dr. Nguyen took it slow, hours in fact, to ensure I remained comfortable, was properly numb, and felt safe. We blasted music together ..."

"I've always heard that a root canal can be one of the most unpleasant experiences a person can endure. Right up there with passing a kidney stone or giving birth. And having worked in the dental industry for 13 years, I've seen and heard many horror stories, including the notion that âa root canal is a future implant case.â So I had no shortage of trepidation when my dentist suggested today that I ..."
